text: Villa La Palestine is a historic mansion in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France. It was built from 1902 to 1905 for Pierre Leclerc. It has been listed as an official historical monument since November 16, 1993. ==References== Category:Houses completed in 1905 Category:Monuments historiques of Marseille Category:1905 establishments in France
title: Villa La Palestine
